title: Ticket #4344: Make special patched v8.0.6 release for CMS
description: CMS is running v8.1.6, but looks like there may be a memory leak. Thus we are creating a special v8.0.6 release for them to run temporarily that cherry-picks large UDP updates (#4321, #4329) and USE_RESOURCE_REQUESTS (#3585).
